stride.summary: As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you have a true love for guiding team strategy and seeing projects through from inception to completion. You have experience teaching TDD and other XP practices and enjoy gaining proficiency in unfamiliar languages.

The VP of Engineering will manage our team of Consultant Managers, develop individual and aggregate career development plans for our consulting team of 50, and directly guide technical strategy and explore ways to improve our value to clients.

As a Principal Developer Consultant, you’ll mentor and lead teams (both internally as well as on the client-side) on the value of Test Driven Development (TDD), Pair Programming, Continuous Deployment, and Continuous Improvement.
